item.title: Troubleshooting guides
item.author: diegojromerolopez@gmail.com (Diego J. Romero-López)
item.description: Troubleshooting guides Usually software is considered only to be code that is executable, sometimes the documentation is also considered part of software, but are the troubleshooting guides part of software? Are these rulebooks useful for the team that uses, maintains, develop or support the software? What is a troubleshooting guide? A troubleshooting guide is a rulebook or more explained a collection of items that should help the users navigate through the issues that could happen.
